title: Tassel, late 17th century
medium: Medium: silk, metal thread, wooden core
description: Skirt of red silk threads, knotted and twisted and ornamented with two rows of tassels of red silk and gilt thread. Head covered with red silk in chevron pattern. Loop of red silk cord.

tombstone.epitaph: Tassel, late 17th century.Medium: silk, metal thread, wooden core. 1908-2-8.
